attributes.additional_details: Closing all grassroots football will not only have a bad effect on mental health of all members involved but also have a bad effect on the physical and keeping fit side. Grassroots outdoors can be done safely.
attributes.background: Let’s keep all outdoor grassroots football playing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow Grassroots football to keep going for juniors: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169

Allow outdoor amateur football to continue during lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557467
